# [Interview #1038: Steelheart Signing Report - Argent, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1038#21)

#### Question

Does Nightblood need to sleep?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Nightblood does not need to sleep, but he sure thinks he needs to.
